feed.title: The Jackson Lab
feed.subtitle: AI-Driven Chemical Theory for Soft Materials

entry.title: Group Trip to Curtis Orchard
entry.summary: Group Trip to Curtis Orchard and pumpkin carving!
entry.content: October 2025 – Group Trip to Curtis Orchard and pumpkin carving!

entry.title: Archana Verma wins Women in Chemical Engineering Travel Award

link.title: Archana Verma wins Women in Chemical Engineering Travel Award

entry.summary: Archana Verma wins a Women in Chemical Engineering Travel Award to go to the 2025 AIChE Annual meeting in November.
entry.content: October 2025 – Archana Verma wins a Women in Chemical Engineering Travel Award to go to the 2025 AIChE Annual meeting in November. Congratulations Archana!

entry.title: Sofia Sivilotti wins ACS Undergraduate Award

link.title: Sofia Sivilotti wins ACS Undergraduate Award

entry.summary: Former undergraduate researcher Sofia Sivilotti wins the Chemistry Department's ACS Undergraduate Award in Physical Chemistry.
entry.content: June 2025 – Former undergraduate researcher Sofia Sivilotti wins the Chemistry Department’s ACS Undergraduate Award in Physical Chemistry. Congratulations Sofia!

entry.title: Jackson Group Canoe Trip 2025
entry.summary: The Jackson Group Canoe Trip 2025 at Sugar Valley Canoes!
entry.content: June 2025 – The Jackson Group Canoe Trip 2025 at Sugar Valley Canoes!

entry.title: Charlie Maier defends thesis and graduates

link.title: Charlie Maier defends thesis and graduates

entry.summary: Charlie Maier defends his thesis and becomes the second Ph.D graduate of the Jackson group.
entry.content: June 2025 – Charlie Maier defends his thesis and becomes the second Ph.D graduate of the Jackson group. Charlie will be joining the University of Notre Dame as a Scientific Artificial Intelligence Postdoctoral Fellow. Congrats Charlie!

entry.title: Group volunteers for outreach at St. Elmo Brady Academy

link.title: Group volunteers for outreach at St. Elmo Brady Academy

entry.summary: The group volunteers for outreach with 3rd graders at the St. Elmo Brady Academy to learn about temperature with homemade thermometers!
entry.content: May 2025 – The group volunteers for outreach with 3rd graders at the St. Elmo Brady Academy to learn about temperature with homemade thermometers!

entry.title: Archana receives GIANT Student Leadership Award

link.title: Archana receives GIANT Student Leadership Award

entry.summary: Archana is part of a team which received a Grassroots Initiatives to Address Needs Together (GIANT) Student Leadership Award.
entry.content: May 2025 – Archana is part of a team which received a Grassroots Initiatives to Address Needs Together (GIANT) Student Leadership Award for their contributions to the development and upcoming research initiative on the weSTEM conference. Congrats Archana!

entry.title: Eliza and Anna win prestigious fellowships

link.title: Eliza and Anna win prestigious fellowships

entry.summary: Eliza Asani wins a DOE Computational Sciences Graduate Fellowship, and Anna DeBernardo wins the NSF Graduate Fellowship Program Award.
entry.content: April 2025 – Eliza Asani wins a DOE Computational Sciences Graduate Fellowship, and Anna DeBernardo wins the NSF Graduate Fellowship Program Award. Congrats both!

entry.title: David Friday defends thesis and graduates

link.title: David Friday defends thesis and graduates

entry.summary: David Friday defends his thesis and becomes the first Ph.D graduate of the Jackson group.
entry.content: March 2025 – David Friday defends his thesis and becomes the first Ph.D graduate of the Jackson group. Congratulations! David will be joining Lilly!

entry.title: Viviana Palacio Betancur wins Beckman Institute Postdoctoral Fellowship

link.title: Viviana Palacio Betancur wins Beckman Institute Postdoctoral Fellowship

entry.summary: Dr. Viviana Palacio Betancur wins a prestigious Beckman Institute Postdoctoral Fellowship.
entry.content: February 2025 – Dr. Viviana Palacio Betancur wins a prestigious Beckman Institute Postdoctoral Fellowship. Congrats Viviana!
